summary: Defines a diffusion pipeline that takes an input image (optionally with a text prompt) and produces varied versions of the image using the UnCLIP architecture, handling image and text encoding, latent preparation, decoder diffusion, and subsequent super‑resolution diffusion to output final images.
business_intent: Enable developers and creators to generate diverse image variations for creative workflows, design exploration, or data augmentation by leveraging a pre‑trained UnCLIP diffusion model within the Diffusers ecosystem.
